basic.description:
A practicum course amalgamating a variety of aspects of theatre and drama.
LEARNING HOURS    384 (144G;240P)
basic.subject: DRAM
basic.title: Applied Theatre

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite    A grade of B- in DRAM300 and (a GPA of 2.60 in DRAM) and registered in a DRAM Major Plan) or permission of the Department.
